title: A Biden Bombshell? (Ep 1253)
description:
In this episode I address the emergence of stunning new evidence implicating Joe Biden in a quid pro quo scandal. I also address the FBI hiding this key witness in both the Spygate and Mike Flynn scandals. 

News Picks:


These two FBI agents MUST testify in front of Congress.

Why did Attorney General Barr say he wasn’t looking at Obama & Biden for potential criminal charges?


The mainstream media’s influence is finally waning. 

Debunking the latest anti-Trump hoax about the firing of the State Department IG.

The Oregon lockdown order is “null and void.”


This is a list of Joe Biden’s trips Ukraine.
